price: 72. Ou alors leur réclamerais-tu un tribut ? Mais le tribut de ton Seigneur est bien meilleur. Car c’est Lui, le meilleur Dispensateur.
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡجٗا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
